subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Finally, a head coach in the National Football League told us what was in his heart. Of course, in the process, the Falcons' Jim Mora put his foot in his mouth — just where we like it.
snippet: Finally, a head coach in the National Football League told us what was in his heart. Of course, in the process, the Falcons' Jim Mora put his foot in his mouth — just where we like it.
